an4.179:4.1: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to Venerable Sāriputta,
an4.179:4.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, Ānanda sat down to one side,
an4.179:4.5: “What is the cause, Reverend Sāriputta, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?”
an4.179:5.1: “Reverend Ānanda, it’s because some sentient beings don’t really understand which perceptions help make things worse, which help keep things steady, which help to distinguish, and which help penetration.’
an4.179:5.2: That’s the cause, that’s the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life.”
an4.179:6.1: “What is the cause, Reverend Sāriputta, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?”
an4.179:6.2: “Reverend Ānanda, it’s because some sentient beings truly understand which perceptions help make things worse, which help keep things steady, which help to distinguish, and which help penetration.’
an4.179:6.3: That’s the cause, that’s the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life.”
